question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. horse statues
B. umbrella
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The horse statues are in the foreground, clearly visible and occupying the lower portion of the image, while the umbrella is positioned behind them and higher up, indicating the horses are closer to the camera.
